d1: My name is Crudu Alexandru. I am 23 years old, I live in Romania, and I`m a full-stack developer.
d2: I enjoy the constant change in the technologies used in the area and love diving into new frameworks, libraries and technologies.
d4s: Typescript, Node.js, React, Next.js, Testing (unit, integration, e2e), ORMs (prisma, sequalize), Docker, AWS, Git and more.
d5: Tech I currently enjoy a lot:
about_description_1: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm a dynamic and creative 24-year-old Full Stack JavaScript Web Developer hailing from the vibrant city of Pitesti, Romania. My journey in the world of web development is fueled by an insatiable passion for crafting innovative digital solutions that seamlessly blend functionality and aesthetics.
about_description_2: With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I bring a holistic approach to web development. Whether it's designing sleek and intuitive user interfaces or architecting robust server-side applications, I thrive on creating seamless digital experiences. My proficiency in technologies like Typescript, Node.js, React etc. allows me to bring ideas to life in the ever-evolving landscape of the web.
about_description_3: Beyond the realm of coding, I find inspiration in my diverse interests. As a fervent automotive enthusiast, I draw parallels between the precision of coding and the engineering excellence of automobiles. Technology, another cornerstone of my interests, is not just a career path but a constant exploration of the latest trends and innovations.
about_description_4: This portfolio is a testament to my commitment to excellence, showcasing a collection of projects that reflect my dedication to craftsmanship and innovation.
e1: I love making electronic music. I have a deep connection to it and love expressing myself through it. When I am not coding or spending time with friends and family, you will find me making music.
e2: In the player here you will find just a couple of my songs which I plan on publishing soon.
